attributes.action: Stop the witch hunt of British soldiers who have served in Iraq and Afghanistan
attributes.background: Our soldiers shouldn't be hounded by ambulance chasing solicitors who are only in it for money, when they were acting under orders, or protecting themselves or colleagues in extreme conditions and under  pressure, it's  easy for lawyers to make incidents seem black and white when they are not

rejection.details:
If you would like publicly-funded investigations of these allegations to stop, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/167734

You could start a new petition calling for specific changes to be made to the rules on entitlement to legal aid, if that's what you would like to happen.
